data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Piacentini, Luis N. (2014): A taxonomic review of the wolf spider genus Agalenocosa Mello-Leitão (Araneae, Lycosidae). Zootaxa 3790 (1): 1-35, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3790.1.1
